Package index

Sparse Marginal Epistasis Analysis

Functions for the marginal epistasis analysis.

sme()
Sparse Marginal Epistasis Test (SME)

Simulate Quantitative Traits

Functions for simulating quantitative traits with pairwise epistasis.

simulate_traits()
Simulate Quantitative Traits from PLINK Genotypes

Utility functions.
